name: Tumblr Galaxy Nebula dashboard ~ custom background
description:
You can choose the background, post color/transparency and text color. Updated very regularly.
The background is HQ, enjoy! o/

My tumblr: http://citrunade.tumblr.com/
additional_info:
For the "Posts' background color and transparency", go here: http://www.css3maker.com/css-3-rgba.html , select your color/opacity and copy/paste what's in the parentheses (parentheses included lol).

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

May 5th, 2015: Background working again + fixed blue recommendations.
July 30th, 2015: Fixed search query and random improvements (more stylish font!).
September 6th, 2015: Text color issues fixed.
October 27th, 2015: Improved reblog & like buttons for darker post background users.
October 28th, 2015: Improved header. It will fill up with your background image.
November 6th, 2015: Removing new big sponsored link.
May 2016: Buttons updated.
